pull.title: test: add ripemd160 to test framework modules list
pull.body:
Currently test runner doesn't execute the unit tests of the ripemd160 module, so add it to the list. All other framework modules that contain unit tests are included, as can be easily checked via
`$ git grep unittest.TestCase ./test/functional/test_framework/`

This is a late follow-up to PR #23716 (commit ad3e9e1f214d739e098c6ebbd300da5df1026a44).

events.message:
test: add ripemd160 to test framework modules list

Currently test runner doesn't execute the unit tests of the ripemd160
module, so add it to the list. All other framework modules that contain
unit tests are included, as can be easily checked via
`git grep unittest.TestCase ./test/functional/test_framework/`

This is a late follow-up to PR #23716 (commit
ad3e9e1f214d739e098c6ebbd300da5df1026a44).

issue.title: backport: merge bitcoin#22029, #27538, #21100, #27542, #24005, partial bitcoin#19953, #23394, #20292, #20161, #20842, #26222 (secp256k1 tests)
issue.body:
## Additional Information

* As mentioned in a [comment](https://github.com/dashpay/dash/pull/5575#issuecomment-1739155379) on [dash#5575](https://github.com/dashpay/dash/pull/5575), partials will remain present as a lot of the associated changes needed for BIP324 coincide with work on Taproot.
  
  This does come with the problematic side effect of complicating Taproot backporting efforts should it be undertaken in the future as the codebase would contain bits and pieces of code that assume changes in Taproot logic, for example, using APIs that have already been changed, requiring OOO modifications to be usable.
* [bitcoin#23394](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23394) is listed as unmerged despite the changes making it to the codebase vide merge commit https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/5ccab7187b35142e03c15dd55390e45b3d233c52, see [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23394#issuecomment-969298828).
* [bitcoin#27542](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27542) is a followup to [bitcoin#23716](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23716) (which was backported via [dash#4843](https://github.com/dashpay/dash/pull/4843))


## Breaking Changes
None, changes are limited to Python-based tests, one fuzzing test and code comments.

## Checklist:
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [x] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas **(note: N/A)**
- [x] I have added or updated relevant unit/integration/functional/e2e tests **(note: N/A)**
- [x] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation **(note: N/A)**
- [x] I have assigned this pull request to a milestone _(for repository code-owners and collaborators only)_
